mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "MEMBER" (ID, PW, NAME, ROADADDR, ADDR, PHONE) VALUES(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{roadaddr}, #{addr}, #{phone})
INSERT INTO MARKET.DELIVERYLIST(DNUM,ID,ROADADDR, ADDR, ADDRFLAG, DNAME) VALUES(DNUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{id},#{roadaddr},#{addr},'Y', #{id})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, SINGOUT FROM "MEMBER" WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE "MEMBER" SET SINGOUT = 'Y', SINGOUTDAY = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE) WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM "REFUND" WHERE ONUM IN (SELECT ONUM FROM "ORDER" WHERE ID = #{id})
DELETE "MEMBER" WHERE SINGOUT = 'Y' AND SINGOUTDAY = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-730)
